body_content.explanation: a way of avoiding a rule that was put in place to stop you from doing something:
examples: The teachers made an end-run around the regulations by using two different textbooks.
Officials in California tried to do an end run around the federal governement.

body_content.explanation: in American football, an occasion when a wide receiver runs across the field behind the line of scrimmage and is handed the ball so that they can run forwards with it:
examples: They tried to fool the defence with an end run.
